content.description: This route climbs pass a large mail box "like" pocket to a few good holds and the a long reach / leap of faith to some good holds which lead to a hard roof move and mantle to the anchors
content.location: This route is about 20 feet to the left of Dog Job and five feet to the right of Mr. Green Jeans

content.description: Climb the ramp through the shelves to an alcove.  Pull out of alcove and follow crack through overhang above.
content.location: At far right end of cliff there is a sloping ramp below two shelves and an inside corner.

content.description: This route climbs past a slightly overhanging large stacked blocks pass 3 bolts to a finish.
content.location: This route is located about 50 feet around the corner and to the right of Return to Sender or just about 5 feet to the right of the old trad route called Save the Wails.

content.description: Climb up blocks to a crack.  Pull the overhanging block to the top.
content.location: 15 feet left of a double trunked tree at left end of cliff.

content.description: Climb Dick Rock Route to a ledge.  Step around left to the main face.  Traverse left over precariously perched block and go to top.
content.location: Where large buttress on left side of cliff forms an inside corner with the main wall.

content.description: This is a fun little route with pockets reaches and even a mantel near the finished.
content.location: This route is located about five to the right of Dick Rock Route and about 10 feet to the left of Blast from the past.

content.description: Pull straight out of alcove to small flake to ledge.  Crank through roof to top.
content.location: On ledge inside alcove right of Dog Job

content.description: Climb straight up through roof to the top.
content.protection: Sport climb with 4 bolts to anchors
content.location: atop the Horn.

content.description: Climb up ramp to the left to a small corner below a roof.  Go out left side of roof to top.
content.location: Atop Dog Job ledge.

content.description: Climb the corner to the horn on the left.  Pull up to ledge.  Walk left until ledge ends.  Traverse to and finish on Dick Rock.
content.location: At obvious right facing corner right of Astroboy.

content.description: From ledge, traverse right onto the main wall.  Follow shallow crack system up and right to top.
content.location: Ledge part way up Dick Rock Route

content.description: Pull series of overhanging blocks to the top.
content.location: At double trunked tree at left end of cliff.

content.description: Dog Job and Dog Job Direct are now a mixed line that climbs the thin book like corner to a large ledge and then climbs the overhangs pass 4 bolts to ring anchors
content.protection: Short crack, takes small nuts or C3 cams. 4  Bolts.
content.location: from Dog Job ledge.

content.description: Climb the corner, pull the roof to ledge.  Finish on Direct or Indirect.  Named after a pulp porno novel found on ledge on FA.  Yes, it was about "doing" dogs.  Pretty funny stuff when you are 15.
content.location: At obvious inside corner with roof in center of cliff.

content.description: Climb up corner to ledge.  Move up and right to the top.
content.location: At corner formed by buttress and main wall at left end of cliff.

content.description: Climb overhanging crack through the broken center of the face to a ledge.  Finish to left or right.
content.location: At corner of buttress and main wall near left end of cliff.

content.description: Pull out of alcove to ledge on right.  Mantle up and traverse to end.  More of a boulder problem than a route.
content.location: From alcove right of Dog Job

content.description: This route climbs pass an old broken drill bit with long reaches pass 4 bolts to the anchors.
content.location: This route is located about 10 feet to the right of Return to Sender and 10 feet to the left of Astroboy

content.description: Climb to the obvious horizontal slot in the wall.  Step up to a flake and traverse to Dog Job ledge.  Finish to right or left.
content.location: Left of Dog Job at rounded wall.

content.description: Climb the akward corner to a ledge.  Follow the crack to the top.
content.location: 25 feet right of Dick Rock Route is a shallow right facing duhedral that starts about 5 feet above the ground.

content.description: Climb up blocks to the roof.  Pull it through the middle to the top.
content.location: Three feet left of the double trunked tree at left end of cliff.

content.description:
East facing sandstone, usually shady. It is downstream of the Big Cliffs. 

 Several new bolts and anchors were added in 2018. The top of the cliff is steep and is covered with debris; it’s best not to set up a Top Rope from the top of the cliff. If possible, one person leads the route, then sets up a top rope by attaching their gear to the permanent anchors. If you must set up the Top Rope from the top of the cliff, please be careful and try not to knock the debris down onto the climbs. 

 If you continue a short distance up the trail to the top there is a small park and swimming pool located there.
